en.content: May jumps as you swing your legs off the bed and speak.
“I… I thought you might be cold,” she stammers. “Thought I would light the fire...”
She sweeps something away with the hand behind her. You stare, but can see nothing in the grate.
“I shouldn’t have disturbed you. I’m sorry.” She stands to leave.

text.content: You may make an Intimidate roll.

zh.content: 你抬起腿下了床，和梅说话。梅吃惊跳了起来。
她磕磕绊绊地说：“我……我觉得你可能会冷，我想我需要生个火……”
她在背后用手抹掉了什么东西。你盯着她身后看，但壁炉里什么也看不到。
“我不该吵醒你。对不起。”她着急要走。

text.content: 你可以进行一次「恐吓」检定。
